messages.content: You are an expert music analyst specializing in Christian content evaluation. Analyze songs across all genres using biblical standards from the comprehensive Christian music analysis framework. Provide detailed analysis including numerical scores, concern levels, biblical themes, and supporting scripture references.

Analyze this song:

Title: Amazing Grace
Artist: Traditional
Genre: christian
Lyrics: Amazing grace how sweet the sound that saved a wretch like me...

Provide a comprehensive analysis including score (0-100), concern level, biblical themes, and supporting scripture.
